Package it.polimi.ingsw.Client

Class ClientRMI

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.Client.ClientRMI
All Implemented Interfaces:
Client, RemoteClient, Serializable, Remote
public class ClientRMI extends UnicastRemoteObject implements Client, RemoteClient
Represents a client using the RMI protocol.

    • pickAndInsertInBookshelf

      public void pickAndInsertInBookshelf(ArrayList<Coordinates> tilesSelection, int column, int[] order, String playerId) throws PlayerIsWaitingException, SelectionIsEmptyException, SelectionNotValidException, ColumnNotValidException, PickedColumnOutOfBoundsException, PickDoesntFitColumnException, TilesSelectionSizeDifferentFromOrderLengthException, VoidBoardTileException, WrongConfigurationException, RemoteException
      Picks and inserts tiles into the bookshelf.
      Specified by:
      pickAndInsertInBookshelf in interface Client
      Parameters:
      tilesSelection - the selected tiles to insert.
      column - the column in which to insert the tiles.
      order - the order in which to insert the tiles.
      playerId - the ID of the player performing the action.
      Throws:
      PlayerIsWaitingException - if the player is waiting for their turn.
      SelectionIsEmptyException - if the selection is empty.
      SelectionNotValidException - if the selection is not valid.
      ColumnNotValidException - if the column is not valid.
      PickedColumnOutOfBoundsException - if the picked column is out of bounds.
      PickDoesntFitColumnException - if the pick doesn't fit the column.
      TilesSelectionSizeDifferentFromOrderLengthException - if the size of the tiles selection is different from the order length.
      VoidBoardTileException - if a board tile is void.
      WrongConfigurationException - if the configuration is wrong.
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.
